column20: A cookie management issue was addressed with improved state management. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited on Intel-based Mac systems.
column26: Apple Multiple Products Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability
column27: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.
column28: Apple iOS, macOS, and other Apple products contain an unspecified vulnerability when processing maliciously crafted web content that may lead to a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack.

column26: Apple Multiple Products Code Execution Vulnerability
column27: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.
